name: Pawning from the Past (Testing)
description:
Controls: A & D or ← & → to move, space bar to jump. Use the shift key to time travel between past and present in the levels. Once you seem to reach the end of a level, touch the blue box of time to move on to the next level. If possible, please play the game in full-screen mode using the button in the bottom right corner.

Please fill out this questionnaire after playing through, thank you!

https://forms.gle/XQZ6wwQVYu4kusqN9

Pawning from the Past is  a pseudo-educational platformer game that can teach kids about the history and cultures of the world. The player must use their time-travelling abilities to swap back and forth between past and present, solve puzzles, and find ancient treasures once thought to be lost forever.

This is a student game created by second-year students at Champlain College, and is currently a work-in-progress.
